favourite.article: To have a normal and proper Christian life there should have a concecration to our whole being. The LORD will work in us and transform us and let allow CHRIST to flow and dwell in us richly. Praise the LORD.

Thank you for this special song!!I renew my love to my LORD MOST HIGH YAHUSHUA who is coming very soon for us \0/ I sing it out with all Praise to Him. It is especially memorable that I found it today Valentine's Day 2012
I love You Lord. I renew my consecration to You. May I fulfill faithfully my stewardship...to dispense You to others for Your economy to be fulfilled, to build Your Body.

We are here to express God. This is what God wants and this is His will. We should not live for our own will. May we all be faithful to this stewardship to dispense God. May God gain a group of consecrated people to carry out His will, for His expression here on earth.

We just sang this hymn a while ago at the YP meeting and it's so sweet. The Lord is able to use anyone for His plan (things not being into being) so we give Him all the glory. It is really a privilege to be called by the Lord to be a normal Christian for His economy so we must grab this opportunity to consecrate ourself to Him and give heed to His calling. Lord Jesus, we just love You!

"Lord, I fully consecrate myself to be a normal Christian in Your economy..." Praise the Lord! It is truly the Lord's grace and mercy that we can consecrate ourselves to Him, for His economy absolutely for His purpose. Lord, gain and use us, or else, we'll be useless. We just love You, Lord Jesus. Amen!
Lord, I fully concecrate myself to be a normal Christian in Your ECONOMY!!!
Lord, I fully consecrate myself solely for ur body! Do take my veils away..to look upon u n ur Body.
Lord Jesus I fully consecrate myself to be A normal Christian in Your economy. I would live solely with the Body in view, Fulfilling my stewardship - "to me for you.". amen!
Amen!!! SAINTS....we have to declare, "LORD I FULLY CONSECRATE MYSELF TO YOU!!"
Me refresca escuchar los Himnos a nuestro Se√±or Jesus.
I was truly and absolutely owned by the triune God for His great move in carrying out His divine and eternal economy..Amen to the triune God..Praise be to Him....Hallelujah to Him.....

This song just reminds me of all the Lord has provided for us in Him. It is so marvelous that we have been predestinated to know this, and that He has revealed so many of His riches to us. Amen for His economy!!!
Praise the Lord!!! This song really touched me... It reminds me to offer my whole being to the Lord to be His steward... Amen!!!!
I love this song so much!
